item.title: Wiremock: How to match multiple urls in a single mapping
item.description: Wiremock is a tool to mock HTTP APIs. You can set up Stubs in Wiremock by using their API or by calling the admin API over HTTP. Usually it is used as part of a test suite but here I’m running the standalone Wiremock server. Once the jar file is downloaded, you can start the server by running the following command: java -jar wiremock-jre8-standalone-2.32.0.jar Here we are setting multiple URLs to match in a single mapping.

item.title: Export Reading list from Safari
item.description: open ~/Library/Safari Copy the Safari bookmarks file to your desktop. Then run the following command to get the list of links plutil -convert xml1 -o - Bookmarks.plist | grep -E -o '<string>http[s]{0,1}://.*</string>' | grep -v icloud | sed -E 's/<\/{0,1}string>//g' References https://apple.stackexchange.com/questions/24864/is-it-possible-to-export-safaris-reading-list-on-safari-5-1#62431

item.title: Tooltip 15: Bash/Zsh function to export SVG diagrams using PlantUML
item.description: In this short clip, we’ll look at creating a simple Bash/Zsh function to export SVG diagrams using PlantUML.
